original_text: Then David and the people who were with him raised their voices and wept until they had no more strength to weep.
korean_text: 다윗과 그와 함께 한 백성이 울 기력이 없도록 소리를 높여 울었더라

sentences.original_text: Then David and the people who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗과 그와 함께 있던 사람들은

sentences.original_text: until they had no more strength to weep
